QuestData.Title: Resources in Ashran
QuestData.Description: Bodrick has mentioned to me that you have acquired some interesting construction notes in your forays out there. A construction guide or assembly notes perhaps?$b$bYou should speak with Kinkade Jacobs in Stormshield. She is willing to exchange finished blueprints for such things.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Kinkade Jacobs at Stormshield in Ashran.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh you have some blueprint texts for me? That's great!$b$bLet's do some business!
